title: 香港先生叫選港男...香港小姐呢？

replies.msg: 點解唔叫選港女

I would think Aiko is very likely to enter the final round. My friend Jason has got a commission to compose a waltz for the pageant as one of the contestants will be showcasing her waltz dance which we all can't wait to see. I should like to extend my heartfelt congratulations to him for having received a commission for a waltz from the pageant since it's a rare opportunity. I too endorse the congratulations on having progressed through the preliminary round. She's a contestant in the beauty contest and i won't be surprised if she progresses through the semifinal.
